DbDetails.DbTable: tms.xtmst_freight x left join tms.xtmst_pickuporder x0 on x.pickuporderid=x0.pickuporderid left join tms.xtmsc_status_option x1 on x.status=x1.statuscode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x2 on x.deliverymode=x2.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x3 on x.consignmentmode=x3.typecode left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x4 on x.deliverymethod=x4.typecode left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x5 on x.fromcityid=x5.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x6 on x.fromxsiteid=x6.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsm_master_city x7 on x.tocityid=x7.cityid left join tms.xtmsm_xsite x8 on x.toxsiteid=x8.xsiteid left join tms.xtmsc_type_option x9 on x.settlementmethod=x9.typecode
DbDetails.Queryformat: select %{data} from (select x.xtmst_freight_id from %{dbtable} where x.carrierid='%{orgguid}' %{where} GROUP BY x.xtmst_freight_id ORDER BY x.xtmst_freight_id) t
